title: COINTELPRO Never Ended: The FISA Loophole and the Impossibility of Challenge
author: Van Kush Family Research Institute

official_narrative: Congress passed FISA in 1978 to prevent future abuses
The system now has checks and balances
reality: FBI surveillance of Black leadership began in 1919 with Marcus Garvey - 37 years before 'official' COINTELPRO
First Black FBI agent hired SPECIFICALLY to destroy a Black economic nationalist movement
FISA designed as reform but Patriot Act and FISA Amendments Act created permanent 'temporary' loopholes
NO functional process to challenge FISA warrant - phones disconnected, addresses unanswered, courts deny standing
Surveillance continues not because it's legal, but because there is no mechanism to stop it

Jones hired specifically to infiltrate UNIA

timeline.1919: Black Star Line shipping company launched
timeline.1919_1922: FBI agents PHYSICALLY SABOTAGE ships by throwing foreign matter into fuel, damaging engines
timeline.1922: Garvey indicted on mail fraud based on Jones's intelligence

methods: Engines damaged by foreign matter in fuel
Dr. Arthur Ulysses Craig (first Black electrical engineer) inspected ships - also Bureau asset

Black economic independence through Black Star Line

marcus_garvey_case.significance: IDENTICAL to later COINTELPRO tactics - but 37-47 years before 'official' program

part3_church_committee_fisa.title: The Church Committee 'Reform' and FISA

exposure.march_8_1971: Citizens' Commission burglaries FBI office in Media, PA - steals 1,000+ documents

part3_church_committee_fisa.church_committee_finding: The Bureau conducted a sophisticated vigilante operation aimed squarely at PREVENTING the exercise of First Amendment rights of speech and association

stated_purpose: Require warrants for domestic surveillance of foreign intelligence targets
Create special court (FISC) to review applications
Establish minimization procedures to protect U.S. persons
key_provisions: Government must get warrant from FISC before surveilling
Must show probable cause target is foreign power or agent
Must minimize collection of U.S. person information

part4_patriot_act_destruction.title: The Patriot Act Destruction of FISA Protections

changes: Allowed 'roving wiretaps' without identifying specific facilities
Permitted 'sneak and peek' delayed notification searches
patriot_act_2001.wall_removed: Foreign intelligence and criminal investigations can now share information

allows: Warrantless surveillance of non-U.S. persons abroad

incidental_collection_loophole.mechanism: When targeting foreigners, Americans' communications 'incidentally' collected
incidental_collection_loophole.result: These communications can be searched WITHOUT a warrant
incidental_collection_loophole.name: Backdoor search loophole

section_702.scale: 200,000+ warrantless backdoor searches per year by FBI, CIA, NSA, NCTC
targets_included: 19,000 donors to a single congressional campaign

reality: Did NOT require warrants for backdoor searches

clapper_v_amnesty_2013.result: Virtually impossible to challenge FISA in court

catch_22: Therefore: NO ONE can challenge FISA surveillance
